TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
You DID order the Positron Porridge, did you not?

 

Waiter! There's a negative gravioli in my soup!

Wonderful! It will be lighter to pick up with your spoon!

WAITER! There's a fly in my soup!

let's see what happens

Oh, I'm terribly sorry, I can take care of that for you. *shoots fly with kilowatt laser*

Soup, there's a fly in my waiter!

*says nothing

*stays being soup

*steams

*waiter dies

Waiter, there's a legless dog in my soup!

Sir, that's just a frankfurter.

 

Waiter! There's spaghetti in my soup!

Are you complaining there is spaghetti in your spaghetti you ordered with extra sauce?

Waiter! There are silicon based lifeforms called the "Chenjesu" in my soup!

Their hydrogen excretions flavor the broth.

Waiter! My soup is mugging me!

My apologies, did you wish it to bowl you?

Waiter! There's excessive vodka in my soup!
You are in a Russian restaurant sir. In Mother Russia, Vodka is water.
waiter! theres something in my soup i had to say about to get this thread going again!

That is a fly. We wanted to check how long it would take for u to notice.

 

Waiter!! There's a porpoise in my soup.

And it is very good soup indeed! *splash*

Waiter! There's a Turing test keeping me from my soup. Help?

Yes, well, robots can't eat soup

Waiter, there is a rip in the space-time continuum in my soup!

then jump in it sir! we need more scientific subjects! you do know in order to eat here you need to participate as a subject in a experiment?

waiter! im in my soup!

On 11/24/2016 at 6:43 PM, StupidAndy said:

then jump in it sir! we need more scientific subjects! you do know in order to eat here you need to participate as a subject in a experiment?

waiter! im in my soup!

You ordered pool portion soup, that'll be $999.99

Pardon me Waiter Sir, but it has appeared that you are in my soup.

Edited November 28, 2016 by Spacetraindriver

Why yes! It is a cool day, and your soup has functioned as a most lovely hot tub

Waiter! There's a chrononaut in my soup!

EDIT: Chrononaut is a fancy way of saying time travelller

Edited November 28, 2016 by Kosmonaut
Waiter there's a Sputnik in my soup!

12 hours ago, Kosmonaut said:

Why yes! It is a cool day, and your soup has functioned as a most lovely hot tub

Waiter! There's a chrononaut in my soup!

EDIT: Chrononaut is a fancy way of saying time travelller

"Why, sorry-

*interrupted by time travelling robot, who asks "are you Sarah Connor?"*

 

Waiter, why did you spit in my soup?

Edited November 29, 2016 by Matuchkin

Simple, you ignored the Sputnik. Sputnik does not like being held in disregard.

 

Waiter, Sputnik has now reappeared in MY soup!

Well of course it has, you ordered a Sputnik Special! 

Waiter, there's a falcon 9 launching in my soup!

That's nice.

Waiter Yuri Gagarin is in my soup!

You would prefer Eduard Khil perhaps?

 

Waiter, Alexi Leonov is orbiting my soup bowl!

If his suit inflates he wont be able to get in your soup so you dont need to worry.

Waiter, theres a star destroyer crashing into my droid controll ship shaped soup bowl.

Sir, please refrain from playing with your Starwars Lego set in the restaurant.

 

Waiter! There's wine in my soup bowl and soup in my wine glass!

sir, stop balancing your food on your drink...

waiter! theres a Bill Cipher in my soup!
